languages.text: {n}Немногое. Следы неприемлемых мутаций, исковеркавших их плоть. Тяжелый запах скверны, исходящий от мяса. Деформированные мозги странного цвета в раздавленных черепах, рождавшие ересь подстрекательства.{/n}

{n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Немногое. Следы неприемлемых мутаций, исковеркавших их плоть. Тяжелый запах скверны, исходящий от мяса. Деформированные мозги странного цвета в раздавленных черепах, рождавшие ересь подстрекательства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that had twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

{n}Not much. The traces of unacceptable mutations that had twisted their flesh. The heavy odour of seditious foulness emanating from meat. It were they who… exuded that odour. The scent that incited the mob to riot.{/n}

{n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

{n}Very little — only the faint traces of the vile mutations that had twisted their bodies and the foul stench of seditious deformation emanating from their meat. They... secreted that odour and used it to incite the mob to riot.{/n}

{n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

{n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that had twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

{n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

{n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nicht viel. Die schwachen Spuren der abscheulichen Mutationen, die ihre Körper entstellt hatten. Der Gestank der Verderbnis steigt aus ihrem Fleisch auf. Die deformierten, seltsam gefärbten Gehirne in ihren eingeschlagenen Schädeln, denen der blasphemische Aufruhr entsprungen war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nicht viel. Die schwachen Spuren der abscheulichen Mutationen, die ihre Körper entstellt hatten. Der Gestank der Verderbnis steigt aus ihrem Fleisch auf. Die deformierten, seltsam gefärbten Gehirne in ihren eingeschlagenen Schädeln, denen der blasphemische Aufruhr entsprungen war.

languages.text: {n}Muy poco. Los débiles rastros de las viles mutaciones que retorcieron sus cuerpos. El terrible hedor de la corrupción que emana de su carne. Los cerebros deformes de color extraño dentro de sus cráneos partidos, donde germinase la herejía de la sedición.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Muy poco. Los débiles rastros de las viles mutaciones que retorcieron sus cuerpos. El terrible hedor de la corrupción que emana de su carne. Los cerebros deformes de color extraño dentro de sus cráneos partidos, donde germinase la herejía de la sedición.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ごくわずかに。連中の体を歪めた下劣な変異のかすかな痕跡。その肉からは、腐敗の悪臭が滲み出ている。つぶれた頭蓋骨の中で奇形し、奇妙な色をした脳が、反乱という異端を生み出したのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ごくわずかに。連中の体を歪めた下劣な変異のかすかな痕跡。その肉からは、腐敗の悪臭が滲み出ている。つぶれた頭蓋骨の中で奇形し、奇妙な色をした脳が、反乱という異端を生み出したのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}几乎找不到什么有用的线索，只有邪恶变异的微弱痕迹，以及他们腐化的血肉中散发出的恶臭。他们畸形的大脑闪烁着古怪的色彩，隐藏在残破的颅骨里，催生着煽动叛乱的异端邪说。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几乎找不到什么有用的线索，只有邪恶变异的微弱痕迹，以及他们腐化的血肉中散发出的恶臭。他们畸形的大脑闪烁着古怪的色彩，隐藏在残破的颅骨里，催生着煽动叛乱的异端邪说。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pas grand-chose. Les traces imperceptibles des viles mutations qui ont défiguré leurs corps. La pestilence de la corruption qui émane de leurs chairs. Les cervelles contrefaites aux couleurs étranges qui ont donné naissance à l'hérésie de la sédition dans leurs crânes brisés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pas grand-chose. Les traces imperceptibles des viles mutations qui ont défiguré leurs corps. La pestilence de la corruption qui émane de leurs chairs. Les cervelles contrefaites aux couleurs étranges qui ont donné naissance à l'hérésie de la sédition dans leurs crânes brisés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çok az şeyi. Bedenlerini çarpıtan habis mutasyonlara ait belli belirsiz izler, etlerinden sızan yozlaşmanın menfur kokusu, isyankârlık kâfirliğinin doğduğu parçalanmış kafataslarındaki tuhaf renkli biçimsiz beyinler...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Very little. The faint traces of the vile mutations that twisted their bodies. The foul stench of corruption emanating from their meat. The deformed, strangely coloured brains in their crushed skulls that spawned the heresy of sedition.{/n}
